ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor.heaume_t: The creatures of the abyss know no death! Only a full set of armor can unleash the power of the heaume...
Prevents death when taking fatal damage and reduces your strength by <DEBUFF_STRENGTH> for <DEBUFF_DURATION> afterward. Cooldown <COOLDOWN>.
ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor.tiara_ti: The reflection of the crystals will only show death! Only a full set of armor can unleash the power of the tiara...
Periodically releases homing abyssal shards that deal damage and weaken monsters. The frequency depends on your lost health.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_tier_1: Attacked villagers have a <CHANCE> chance of dropping <COUNT> emeralds.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_tier_2: Attacked villagers have a <CHANCE> chance of dropping <COUNT> emeralds. Otherwise, the villager will drop a random stock item.
ability.aquamirae.divider: Reduces the target's max health by <STRENGTH> for <DURATION>. Stacks up to <STACK> times.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_1: This enchanted pouch promises treasure, but only those who dare to accept its challenge will be able to reveal its true contents.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_2: The pouch gives you more precious treasures. You have managed to move forward, but there are still challenges ahead of you.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_3: Your efforts have unlocked treasures more valuable than you expected. You only have a little time left and you will reach your final goal.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_4: You have reached the top! The enchanted pouch reveals its true contents. Your patience and courage have paid off, and now you can enjoy your well-deserved reward.
ability.aquamirae.fin_cutter: Deals <BONUS> more damage for each empty heart you have (max <MAX_BONUS>).
ability.aquamirae.remnants_saber: While in water, damage increases by <BONUS>.
ability.aquamirae.rune_of_the_storm: Summons a storm chakram that accompanies you and deals <DAMAGE> melee damage. Each instance of damage depletes <COST> rune charges.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor_tier_1: Inflicts poison on enemies for <POISON_DURATION> when attacked.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor_tier_2: Inflicts poison on enemies for <POISON_DURATION> when attacked. Taking damage in water boosts your swimming speed by <BOOST_STRENGTH> for <BOOST_DURATION>.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_sword: Has a <BONUS_CHANCE> chance of causing double damage. If the hit isn't fatal, you have a <DEBUFF_CHANCE> chance of taking <DEBUFF_DAMAGE> magic damage.
ability.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor_tier_: Only a full set of armor will allow you to descend to the bottom of the Ice Maze.

While underwater, it provides oxygen and prevents freezing. The weight of the suit will pull you down.

Press {KEY_ARMOR_BONUS} to release 10 oxygen and temporarily increase your mobility and reduce weight.
ability.aquamirae.whisper_of_the_abyss: Reduces the target's armor by <STRENGTH> for <DURATION>. Stacks up to <STACK> times.
ability.aquamirae.axe_of_frostfire: Can be thrown. Hurls a flames that inflicts weakness and slows nearby creatures for <DURATION> or until retrieved.
ability_goal.aquamirae.apply_effect: <PROGRESS> of <AMOUNT> times the effect was applied
ability_goal.aquamirae.defeat_monsters_l: <PROGRESS> of <AMOUNT> monsters defeated with 3 or fewer hearts
ability_goal.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor: <PROGRESS> of <AMOUNT> Three Bolt Armor pieces equipped
ability_goal.aquamirae.challenge_1: <PROGRESS> of <AMOUNT> Anglerfishes defeated with full set of cursed armor
ability_goal.aquamirae.challenge_2: Torturer defeated with full set of cursed armor
ability_goal.aquamirae.challenge_3: Captain Cornelia defeated with full set of cursed armor
perk.aquamirae.rune_of_the_storm: Killed creatures scatter homing ice shards. The number of shards depends on the maximum health.
advancements.aquamirae.abyssal_armor.des: Craft and equip a full set of Abyssal Armor
advancements.aquamirae.catch_golden_moth: Catch a shining moth in a bottle

advancements.aquamirae.obtain_fin.title: Terrible fish
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_frozen_key: Use the Shell Horn near the water and take the key from the captain's ghost
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_shell_horn: Find an important item while exploring frozen ships
advancements.aquamirae.root.description: Find the Ice Maze location in the Frozen Ocean biome.
advancements.aquamirae.root.title: Aquamirae

effect.aquamirae.abyss_blindness.desc: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Decreases movement speed.
effect.aquamirae.abyss_blindness.descrip: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Decreases movement speed.
effect.aquamirae.crystallization.desc: Blinding Abyss armor effect. You deal 80% less damage and die when the effect ends.
effect.aquamirae.crystallization.descrip: Blinding Abyss armor effect. You deal 80% less damage and die when the effect ends.
effect.aquamirae.strong_armor.desc: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Increases armor value.
effect.aquamirae.strong_armor.descriptio: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Increases armor value.
effect.aquamirae.terrible_armor.desc: Armor effect. Increases underwater movement speed.
effect.aquamirae.terrible_armor.descript: Armor effect. Increases underwater movement speed.
effect.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor.desc: Armor effect. Increases underwater movement speed.
effect.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor.descri: Armor effect. Increases underwater movement speed.
info.aquamirae.cornelia_awakened: Ghost of Captain Cornelia was awakened!
info.maze_mother_spawn: §c You feel the vibrations under the ice...
item.aquamirae.maze_mother_spawn_egg: Mother of the Maze Spawn Egg
lore.aquamirae.frozen_key: Opens a chest hidden in the depths of the Ice Maze.
lore.aquamirae.golden_moth_in_a_jar: Some treasures can have their own souls, not only devour others...
lore.aquamirae.liquid_curse: Hover over another item and right-click to suppress the {RED}Dead {RED}Sea {RED}Curse {GRAY}on it.
lore.aquamirae.luminescent_bubble: Increases the swimming speed of nearby players. Place afloat to build underwater roads.
lore.aquamirae.oxygen_generator: While in inventory, slowly restores oxygen.
lore.aquamirae.pirate_pouch: Forgotten pirate clothes that smell like rotten oysters...
lore.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch.content_3:
- Legendary Accessories
- Smithing Templates
- Collectibles
- Materials
lore.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch.content_4:
- Legendary Weapons
- Legendary Accessories
- Smithing Templates
- Collectibles
- Materials
lore.aquamirae.poseidons_breakfast: Food of the Sea Gods. > §9Fury X (3:00) > §9Rush V (3:00) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+100% Ability Power > §9+50% Cooldown Reduction
lore.aquamirae.sea_casserole: Is it looking at me? > §9Rush II (1:30) > §9Strength (0:30) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+20% Cooldown Reduction > §9+3 Attack Damage
lore.aquamirae.sea_stew: The power of the sea in your stomach! > §9Fury III (2:00) > §9Strength (2:00) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+30% Ability Power > §9+3 Attack Damage
lore.aquamirae.shell_horn: To summon Captain Cornelia, blow into the shell horn for at least 3 seconds near the water in the Ice Maze.
lore.aquamirae.ship_graveyard_echo: If you listen carefully, you can hear the horns of hundreds of ships lost in the Ice Maze...
lore.aquamirae.treasure_pouch: Once valuable loot, now worthless trinkets under the ice...
lore.aquamirae.treasure_pouch.content:
- Ship & Outpost Maps
- Smithing Templates
- Pirate clothing
- Accessories
lore.aquamirae.wisteria_niveis: Even in the midst of an icy wasteland, a wonderful life can appear. Can be placed.
lore.aquamirae.ship_graveyard_ring: When equipped, you ignore {DARK_AQUA}Hydrophobia{GRAY}. Triggers no more than once every 10 seconds.
lore.aquamirae.ice_maze_ring: When equipped, you ignore {DARK_GREEN}Poison{GRAY}. The cooldown depends on the effect amplifier.
lore.aquamirae.dead_sea_ring: When equipped, creatures can't inflict {RED}Dead {RED}Sea {RED}Curse {GRAY}upon you.
lore.aquamirae.shoe_spikes: When equipped, increases friction with slippery blocks.
lore.aquamirae.spine_arrow: Moves well underwater, but gets knocked down by the wind. Poisons the target for a short time. Ship Graveyard creatures take triple damage.
lore.aquamirae.abyssal_arrow: On impact, shatters into multiple homing abyssal shards that deal damage and weaken monsters. Ice Maze creatures take triple damage.
lore.aquamirae.rune_of_the_storm: Hover over melee weapon and right-click to upgrade it with the following ability:
toast.aquamirae.curse.title: Your item was cursed!
